title: TAKE MY 4 RP
body:
THROUGH A STROKE OF LUCK, I HAVE OBTAINED EXACTLY 6300 IP, AND BOUGHT A CHAMP.

Right now I have 0 IP, and 4 RP.  
Seeing as how there's no way to buy 971 RP exactly. I've taken it upon myself to ask Riot to remove the 4 RP. So I can have 0 RP and 0 IP and rest in peace. 

My OCD must be satisfied.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=V2kMfcyX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-28T15:35:58.724+0000)
>
> B...but it's yours. :3

Nooo.... I figured you guys wouldn't be able to take it from me. 

What do I do now? ;~;
You could try asking Player Support.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=V2kMfcyX,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-06-28T15:44:37.840+0000)
>
> You could try asking Player Support.

LOL. Thanks? BRB. I'll let you know how it works out

I once asked support to take my 2589 RP and gift a rioter something for me, but they were real a-holes and refused :/

Even when I gift Rioters stuff they keep refunding it, they're kindda annoying when it comes to that, except this one time when I decided to gift a limited Summoner Icon cause the individual was missing the event, so by the time this certain Rioter came back (a few months later) it was too late to refund it, my genius plan worked!


Now beyond that, I'm fresh out of ideas.

You could always gift me Sandstorm Ekko ;)

(Actually don't, I'm toxic and don't deserve it. Why not gift it to the really awesome team-players in your games?)

EUNE.

I got 514 Friendly, 243 Helpful, 1351 Teamwork and 614 Honorable Opponent, honors.
Now do you have any idea how often people honor at higher elo?

My point is, I am usually the really awesome player on the team, keeping people from tearing each others throats out, raging, coming up with strategies and so on, and I never get gifted for stuff like that, I just do it.

Don't believe me? Here have a look at [this thing](http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-gameplay-en/mr8E2Vxb-a-guide-to-understanding-the-dynamics-of-bot-lane) I wrote, that got stickied over on the EU boards.

Be the change you wish to see in the world. You already partially embrace that philosophy, you may as well go all out. 

Or you could like buy yourself things with the RP. That's what people normally do.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=V2kMfcyX,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-06-28T15:44:37.840+0000)
>
> You could try asking Player Support.

I always wondered where Riot gets all that extra RP to give to the people who make art for them so they can buy something.

RP Donators.
Anyone with lower than 70 RP (70 being the lowest RP cost for anything in the game, one-game skins in ARAM) should have their RP taken and given to charity. Please.
No, don't decide what happens with my RP.  If I do donate to a charity, it will be one of my choosing - not somebody else's.
